statements: UPDATE production_defects SET defect_description = 'Fixed the issue' WHERE defect_id = 1;
UPDATE production_defects SET defect_type = 'Hardware' , production_line_id = 2 WHERE defect_id = 2;
UPDATE production_defects SET defect_type = 'Visual', defect_description = 'Scratches on the surface' WHERE defect_id = 101;
UPDATE production_defects SET defect_date = '2022-09-15', production_line_id = 3 WHERE defect_id = 102;
UPDATE defect_rates SET defect_severity = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE production_line SET defect_rate = 0.05, production_speed = 100 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE defect_rates SET defect_severity = 3, production_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE production_line SET defect_rate = 0.05, production_speed = 200 WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC';
UPDATE defect_reports SET defect_type = 'Hardware Issue' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE production_lines SET supervisor_id = 101, line_name = 'Line A' WHERE line_id = 1;
UPDATE defect_reports SET defect_type = 'Mechanical', production_line_id = 3 WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE production_lines SET supervisor_id = 5, line_name = 'Production Line Alpha' WHERE line_id = 1;
UPDATE defect_rate SET defect_count = 10 WHERE product_name = 'Product A' AND defect_type = 'Type 1';
UPDATE production_line SET line_manager = 'John Doe' WHERE line_number = 1;
UPDATE defect_rate SET defect_count = defect_count + 1 WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE production_line SET line_manager = 'John Doe', start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE line_number = 101;
UPDATE ProductionLineDefects SET defect_category = 'Electrical' WHERE defect_id = 1;
UPDATE ProductionLineEntries SET quantity_produced = 200, defect_id = 2 WHERE entry_id = 5;
UPDATE ProductionLineDefects SET defect_name = 'Scratched Surface', defect_description = 'Surface of the product is scratched' WHERE defect_id = 1;
UPDATE ProductionLineProducts SET product_name = 'Revised Product', product_category = 'Improved Category', product_description = 'Product has been enhanced with new features' WHERE product_id = 5;
